subroutine bubble_sort(arr)
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
    integer :: i, j, temp
    logical :: swapped
    do
        swapped = .false. do j = 1, size(arr)-1
            if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then
                temp = arr(j)
                arr(j) = arr(j+1)
                arr(j+1) = temp
                swapped = .true.
            end if
        end do
        if (.not.
children.label: code_analysis

swapped) exit
    end do
end subroutine bubble_sort

children.text:
Now, putting all the code together in Fortran. First, the code structure:

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, i, count, j, found = 0

    integer, allocatable :: a(:), unique(:)

    ! Read n and the array

    read(*,*) n

    allocate(a(n))

    read(*,*) (a(i), i=1,n)

    !
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
Sort the array

    call bubble_sort(a)

    ! Create unique array

    count =1

    do i=2, n

        if (a(i) /= a(i-1)) then

            count = count +1

        end if

    end do

    allocate(unique(count))

    unique(1) = a(1)

    j=1

    do i=2, n

        if (a(i) /= a(i-1)) then

            j = j +1

            unique(j) = a(i)

        end if

    end do

    ! Check for three consecutive numbers

    found =0

    do i=1, count-2

        if (unique(i+1) == unique(i)+1 .and. unique(i+2) == unique(i+1)+1) then

            found =1

            exit

        end if

    end do

    ! Output the result based on found

    if (found ==1) then

        print*, 'First'

    else

        print*, 'Second'

    end if

contains

    subroutine bubble_sort(arr)

        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)

        integer :: i, j, temp

        logical :: swapped

        do

            swapped = .false. do j = 1, size(arr)-1

                if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then

                    temp = arr(j)

                    arr(j) = arr(j+1)

                    arr(j+1) = temp

                    swapped = .true.

                end if

            end do

            if (.not.
children.label: code_analysis

children.text:
swapped) exit

        end do

    end subroutine bubble_sort

end program main

Alternatively, here's a simple bubble sort for the array:

subroutine bubble_sort(arr)
    integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
    integer :: i, j, temp
    logical :: swapped
    do
        swapped = .false.
        do j = 1, size(arr)-1
            if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then
                temp = arr(j)
                arr(j) = arr(j+1)
                arr(j+1) = temp
                swapped = .true.
            end if
        end do
        if (.not. swapped) exit
    end do
end subroutine bubble_sort

Putting it all together.

Now, putting all the code together in Fortran.

First, the code structure:

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n, i, count, j, found = 0

    integer, allocatable :: a(:), unique(:)

    ! Read n and the array

    read(*,*) n

    allocate(a(n))

    read(*,*) (a(i), i=1,n)

    ! Sort the array

    call bubble_sort(a)

    ! Create unique array

    count =1

    do i=2, n

        if (a(i) /= a(i-1)) then

            count = count +1

        end if

    end do

    allocate(unique(count))

    unique(1) = a(1)

    j=1

    do i=2, n

        if (a(i) /= a(i-1)) then

            j = j +1

            unique(j) = a(i)

        end if

    end do

    ! Check for three consecutive numbers

    found =0

    do i=1, count-2

        if (unique(i+1) == unique(i)+1 .and. unique(i+2) == unique(i+1)+1) then

            found =1

            exit

        end if

    end do

    ! Output the result based on found

    if (found ==1) then

        print*, 'First'

    else

        print*, 'Second'

    end if

contains

    subroutine bubble_sort(arr)

        integer, intent(inout) :: arr(:)

        integer :: i, j, temp

        logical :: swapped

        do

            swapped = .false.

            do j = 1, size(arr)-1

                if (arr(j) > arr(j+1)) then

                    temp = arr(j)

                    arr(j) = arr(j+1)

                    arr(j+1) = temp

                    swapped = .true.

                end if

            end do

            if (.not. swapped) exit

        end do

    end subroutine bubble_sort

end program main
